last_episode_to_air.name: London Calling
last_episode_to_air.overview: In this dramatic Series finale gets the excitement of her life when a big record label in london offers her a signing contract, the dramatic part is at the same time tommy just proposed to her and going to london would mean leaving everything that she loves behind.

name: Instant Star
overview: When Jude Harrison enters G Major’s singer/songwriter contest, she knows her stuff will kill, but she’s shocked when she learns she won the whole darn thing! Now, with a recording contract, a soon-to-be released single and a mega-crush on her producer, Jude’s wading through a world bigger than her wildest rock n’ roll dreams. Thrust into the spotlight, Jude is desperate to prove she belongs there…but she’s not even old enough to drive.

episodes.name: Even Better Than The Real Thing
episodes.overview: Charming, punk underdog Jude Harrison shocks everyone by winning the first ""Instant Star"" songwriting contest, landing a prestigious record contract and a life that will never again just be ""normal"".

episodes.name: Come As You Are
episodes.overview: Jude loses the cover of a major music magazine to Eden, the snotty push-up-braâ€™d runner-up in the Instant Star songwriting contest. So Tommy Q. takes Jude -- and her increasingly resentful older sister Sadie -- to a wild hip- hop party being thrown by the magazineâ€™s publisher -- someone with whom Tommy has a very complicated history. Jude tries to â€œplay the gameâ€ and one-up Eden with disastrous results. Ultimately itâ€™s Judeâ€™s genuine connection with someone unexpected that saves the dayâ€¦

episodes.name: Oh Well, Whatever, Nevermind
episodes.overview: Jude is suddenly given a first-class ticket to popularity central when her publicist arranges for Jude to perform her first single in front of the entire school. Jude allows herself to get swept up in all the attention until hit with two unexpected and painful truths: some of the students are planning anti-Jude walkout during the televised concert, and more importantly, her best friend Jamie HATES her new song.

episodes.name: Hey Sister
episodes.overview: The record company freaks out when Jude plays her new song for the radio powers-that-be and gets some very negative reactions. Tommy's so disappointed in himself that he even threatens to quit. Desperate to keep her number one producer (and crush) in the picture, Jude hatches the perfect plan â€“insisting that she and Tommy just need to ""get away"" with nothing but a guitar and four-track to perfect Jude's sound. Things get complicated when the isolated mentor and his student find themselves connecting over more than just the musicâ€¦and things get downright messy when Jude's hot sister Sadie shows up.

episodes.name: You Can't Always Get What You Want
episodes.overview: Jude's finally starting to feel comfortable at G Major -- and more than comfortable with Tommy -- when her world and her producer are yanked out from under her, thanks to the arrival of seventeen year-old hip-hop sensation Shay. But Jude's determined not to give up her musical territory without a fight. When Jude goes too far and is forced to apologize at Shay's big concert, she's shocked when her would-be enemy serenades her with a love song. After all, she'd NEVER fall for such a spoiled, arrogant jerkâ€¦would she?!

episodes.name: Kiss Me Deadly
episodes.overview: Jude's great at a lot of things, but dancing ain't one of themâ€¦which is unfortunate since that's the general theme of her first video -- the one that's going to showcase her hot hot duet with Shay. Too bad the one thing that's not quite hot hot enough for Jude is her relationship with her co- star. Still, she's floored when he breaks up with herâ€¦the day before their scheduled on-screen kiss. How's a girl to make nice onscreen with the boy that just broke her heart off camera?

episodes.name: I Wanna Be Your Boyfriend
episodes.overview: Jude's landed her first official boyfriendâ€¦and it doesn't hurt that he's an uber-famous rapper! But she can't keep him separate from the rest of her world forever. So Jude invites Shay to the school danceâ€¦and dinner with the family. As if that wasn't awkward enough, Tommy shows up, determined to prove to Jude that Shay is NOT the guy she thinks he is. Jude wants to defend her boyfriend, but she has doubtsâ€¦especially when he starts flirting with her high school nemesisâ€¦

episodes.name: Unsweet Sixteen
episodes.overview: G Major is planning Jude the sweet sixteen birthday party of a lifetime â€“ but Jude's even more pleased Shay's coming back from tourâ€¦and that she and Tommy Q are actually getting along for a change. But when Jude overhears someone's startling love confession, her big night is thrown into turmoil.

episodes.name: Won't Get Fooled Again
episodes.overview: After having her heart broken by two different guys in one night, Jude's decided to stay close to home. Too bad home isn't quite how she remembers it. Sadie and her Dad seem totally at odds, and Jude isn't quite sure why. Meanwhile, her personal and professional relationship with Tommy is rapidly disintegrating. Just when Jude's sure she's reached the boiling point...a new, devastating betrayal is revealed.

episodes.name: Lose This Skin
episodes.overview: Vulnerable and lonely since her parents' breakup, Jude turns to Jamie, the one person who's never let her down. Jamie figures Jude can't handle any more unpleasant ""surprises"", so he spills the beans about his relationship with Kat. Jude plays like she's cool with her two best friends dating, but soon realizesâ€¦she wants the boy-next-door all to herself. So much for unpleasant surprisesâ€¦

episodes.name: All Apologies
episodes.overview: Jude's thrilled to be playing the big music charity do she grew up watching on television, until informed that she'll be dueting with Eden - the Instant Star runner-up, and bleached blond shedevil who stole Shay. Unusually Zen-like Tommy implores Jude to bury the hatchet â€“ that is, until his own nemesis - and former bandmate - shows up pushing a Boyz Attack reunion. With Tommy desperately trying to shake his past, and Jude trying to control her future, this is one charity event that'll be lucky to end in peaceâ€¦

episodes.name: Train In Vain
episodes.overview: Jude's about to finish her album, and she should be ecstatic. But she's too preoccupied about losing Tommy - who's just announced he doesn't think he'll produce her next album. Jude thinks she might be able to change his mind if she can just help Tommy relaunch his own solo career - but it will require Jude to make a sacrifice that will compromise her own success...

episodes.name: Should I Stay Or Should I Go
episodes.overview: What a long strange trip it's been for Jude Harrison, Instant Star. And it's about to get even stranger as she prepares for her summer tour. What's a girl to do when faced with a shocking offer from ex-boyfriend Shay, the surprising news that her producer is dating her sister, and a romantic ultimatum from Jamie? Does being a rock n' roll superstar really have to mean always going it alone?

episodes.name: No Sleep 'Til Brooklyn (1)
episodes.overview: More info soon! (Reminder, the air date for this episode is unknown. When it become available, it will be shown.)

episodes.name: No Sleep 'Til Brooklyn (2)
episodes.overview: More info soon

episodes.name: I Fought The Law
episodes.overview: More info soon

episodes.name: Miss World
episodes.overview: Jude can't wait to get back in the studio to start on her sophomore album, but unless she can pay for studio time, Darius and Liam will ban her from G-Major.

episodes.name: Viciousness
episodes.overview: Kat struggles trying to find a place in Jude's life, and Tommy's trying to find his place in G-Major.

episodes.name: The Jean Genie
episodes.overview: After pushing Kat and Jamie away, Jude is scared to lose Spiederman too when he wants to be more to her than just a backup.

episodes.name: Stranger in the House
episodes.overview: When Sadie dumps Tommy, Jude tries to reunite them when she finds out some interesting information about Tommy's past.

episodes.name: Personality Crisis
episodes.overview: When Jude gets nominated for a Peoples Picks, Spiederman isn't exactly boyfriend of the year.

episodes.name: Hallelujah
episodes.overview: Jude is focused on having a normal birthday this year,but somehow ends up locked in an abandoned club with Tommy.

episodes.name: Problem Child
episodes.overview: Jude flunks her music midterms. Jamie worries about being cool. Jude visits an elementary school for publicity.

episodes.name: Mother's Little Helper
episodes.overview: Throw in Jude and Tommy working together, plus Victoria putting the house up for sale, and you get one Sadie who's addicted to shopping (using her sister's money).

episodes.name: When I Come Around
episodes.overview: Darius thinks that Jude's sophomore album is missing something

episodes.name: Date with the Night
episodes.overview: With her album finished, Jude prepares for the release party.

episodes.name: Lose Yourself
episodes.overview: The Instant Star is chosen just as Jude is dealing with a personal crisis. The pictures that were taken at Barry's have resurfaced and he wants 50,000 dollars or they go to the press.

episodes.name: Like a Virgin
episodes.overview: When Jude releases her photos herself she suffers some backlash and is forced to sit on Karma's first press conference. Big mistake, since Karma announced live that Jude wasn't a virgin, but instead of correcting her she decides to fight back with Patsy. Meanwhile Tommy finds out about Sadie and Kwest.

episodes.name: Start Me Up
episodes.overview: Jude finds out that not only will Karma will be doing a cover of her song Tommy will be producing Karma's album. So she decides to produce a song all on her own.

episodes.name: Helter Skelter
episodes.overview: Patsy's behavior is out of control, and everyone can see it. Not only is she wasting studio time, but she's also pulling at Jamie's heartstrings. Everyone decides that enough is enough. Jude tries to get through to Patsy, but it only angers her more. She gets drunk and goes off for a drive...

episodes.name: Let It Be
episodes.overview: When Patsy dies it is up to Jude to honor her memory and protect her from G-major vultures and even...Jamie.

episodes.name: Heart of Gold
episodes.overview: After Patsy's death Jude decides to host a benefit concert for homeless kids and is depending on Sadie to help her. But is she pushing Sadie away by constantly depending on her and not doing anything on her own?

episodes.name: 18 Part 1
episodes.overview: Things between Tommy and Jude are getting hot, and now that Jude's turning eighteen, everything seems totally fine... but when something from Tommy's past shows up to haunt him, nothing will be the same.

episodes.name: 18 Part 2
episodes.overview: After Jude approaches Tommy after she's done singing to him, he publicly turns her down.

episodes.name: Nowhere To Run
episodes.overview: After being dumped by Tommy at her birthday party Jude has to pretend she isn't affected-on a MTV documentary.

episodes.name: Celebrity Skin
episodes.overview: After mistakenly wearing real fur at a fashion shoot Jude tries to make up for it by insulting meat-eaters, which results in everyone turning against her. With all the commotion will everyone see the real threat?

episodes.name: Sympathy for the Devil
episodes.overview: Jude tries to help mend Sadie's love life, and meanwhile Darius is hiding something from Tommy.

episodes.name: All I Want Is You
episodes.overview: Tommy and Jamie both want Jude, and she is forced to make a decision between them.

episodes.name: Your Time Is Gonna Come
episodes.overview: Jude has everything she wants but when she realizes how many have come before her, will she be enough for Tommy?

episodes.name: She Drives Me Crazy
episodes.overview: With the reality TV cameras rolling, Karma's desire for fame grows as Karma and Spiederman's wedding approaches.

episodes.name: Changes
episodes.overview: Jude attempts to repair her friendship with Jamie. Sadie tries to figure out a way to ask Jude if Kwest can move in. Meanwhile, a dare causes Jude and Sadie's house party to take a serious turn.

episodes.name: Us and Them
episodes.overview: After Jude and Tommy have a close encounter with the paparazzi, Darius decides it is time for them to go public. After Jude goes on about her love for Tommy on a talk show, the public reaction does more than surprise her.

episodes.name: We Belong
episodes.overview: When Tommy is called out of town, Jude wonders why he's being so mysterious. Is their relationship on the rocks?

episodes.name: My Hometown
episodes.overview: Jude surprises Tommy by following him to his hometown, where she learns about his troubled past. Song: "Here We Go Again"

episodes.name: Not an Addict
episodes.overview: Jude's obsession with perfecting her third album threatens her career, her relationshops, and her health. Song: "I Just Wanted Your Love"

episodes.name: Possession
episodes.overview: Tommy returns and Megan tries to help Jude get over him; Blu and Zeppelin come to slaps over Jamie; Tommy is assigned to produce Karma and Speed's tv theme song.

episodes.name: Every Breath You Take
episodes.overview: Tommy and Jude play poker to decide who gets what in their break up. Karma's reality show debuts - with her as the villain. She decides to find another villain even if she must frame them.

episodes.name: Gimme Gimme Shock Treatment
episodes.overview: While the G Major team is out building morale at a spa retreat, Jude is left alone with a very disturbed Megan.

episodes.name: London Calling
episodes.overview: In this dramatic Series finale gets the excitement of her life when a big record label in london offers her a signing contract, the dramatic part is at the same time tommy just proposed to her and going to london would mean leaving everything that she loves behind.
